page.title: 13Industry
page.content: In our blocks in Accrington there are many Industries.Some of the main Industries are Callogan Foam,Makron Plastics,Rand J Autos,G and B Timber Products.There are also alot of garages and Engineers. Most of these are situated on Broad Oak Industrial Estate.There are also two mills and two scrap yards.Nearer the town centre there are Plumbers Merchants,a dairy,and more joiner's workshops and wood merchants.As we were looking about we found a closed down mine shaft.Also in our blocks there is a Police Station,Fire Station and an Ambulance Station.There are also a few taxi firms.Most of the garages are situated on the main road.(Manchester Road).They do car sales,repairs and sell petrol.The biggest Industrial site is Broad Oak Industrial Estate.
